What is Activities?


The Student Activities program at BYU-Idaho really offers something for everyone. It is run by students - for students. You can participate at any level you want. You choose the level of involvement that’s right for you. Choose your:


  • skill level
  • time committment
  • degree of intensity
  • level of challenge

Choose to participate in one of our many events, programs, leagues or shows. Or choose to become involved in running the program by being a volunteer, manager, coordinator, director or area director.


See what’s happening in one of the eight areas of Activities.
